name: Catacomb: Dark Web (Soft hand-in version)
description:
As Above So Below - EPIC Games Jam (Uni Project)

This game (In its current form) is made from the collabrative of the following 7 members & Fellow Uni students:

Leonard Siminischi - 3D Asset Design/ Sound Design (Project Lead)

Charlotte Roizdesa - 3D Asset Design/ Sound Design

Orlando James - Environment Concepting & Design

Johannes Kuhn - Blueprint Development/ Concepting

Bartosz Baranowski - Concepting/ 2D Assets

Louie (Abigail) Frewer - UI Design (Not yet implimented)

Ryan Drewry - AI Coding/ Animation/ Blueprint Development

Game:

You are trapped within a Catacomb deep underground. Nothin but a glowing orb infront of you lights your way. But your not alone down there. The Undead Cryptkeeper patrols the dimly lit catacombs, looking to havest the blood of anything living. 

Your goal:

Traverse the long and winding halls of the catacombs and find the exit before your light runs out and the Cryptkeeper havests you.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Using item: Left mouse (Raise/ Lower Arm)

                          Right mouse (Uses item to open gates and freeze monster)

(When you start you will need to left click, then walk over to the light and right click to pick it up. After which. Left click will hault the light meter from tickin down. but youll be plunged in darkness. Right click only works while your arm is raised and uses the item to open doors and freeze the monster implace for a short time at the expense of a chunk of you light meter)

Footnotes:

At this point in time, this version is limited due to complications close to "Soft hand-in". Therefore the following isnt present for this current avaliable version:

-Working gates

-Collision for alot of the maze

-Start and end (death & victory) screens

-Sounds
